content.description: A numeric test score is to be converted to a letter grade of A, B, or C according to the following rules: A score greater than 90 is considered an A; a score between 80 and 90, inclusive, is considered a B; and any other score is considered a C.
content.question: Which of the following code segments will assign the correct letter grade to grade based on the value of the variable score ?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
